```{r}
d3 <- read_csv("https://uoepsy.github.io/data/dapr3_mindfuldecline.csv")
d3$isImp <- ifelse(d3$imp=="imp",1,0)

library(lme4)

glmer(isImp ~ visit + (1+visit|ppt), d3, family=binomial) |> summary()

```
